pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces a change in the senior ranks of the Public Service | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following change in the senior ranks of the Public Service:

Taki Sarantakis, currently Associate Secretary of the Treasury Board, becomes President of the Canada School of Public Service, effective July 9, 2018.

The Prime Minister took the opportunity to congratulate Wilma Vreeswijk, former President of the Canada School of Public Service, on the occasion of her retirement from the Public Service, following an exceptional career marked by dedication and excellence in serving Canadians.
